GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.118 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
arm64: Fix match_list for erratum 1286807 on Arm Cortex-A76

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 189623261994fe6e7416b3648f2c0d5f71e9e3b4, it was introduced in version v5.10.118 by commit a698bf1f728c95087a60e0b71cd5cc225ec3332f. For more details please see the references link.
